summary: This is an FBI Victim Services Division briefing memo for a victim briefing held in Miramar, Florida on October 15, 2019, as part of the Epstein investigation. It outlines the agenda, attendees, and logistics for meetings with victims and their attorneys, noting 9 victims were represented among 17 total attendees.

events.title: Miami Victim Briefing
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division held a briefing for victims of the Epstein investigation in Miramar, Florida, with presentations on prosecutions, media, victim rights, and open discussion.

events.title: Scheduled Victim Interviews

keyFacts: A victim briefing was held on October 15, 2019, in Miramar, Florida, as part of the Epstein investigation (NY-3027571).
There were 17 total attendees representing 9 victims, including 5 support guests and 3 attorneys.
Attorneys representing victims included Bradley Edwards, Brittany Henderson, and a likely miswritten 'Robert C. losefsbere, Esq.'
The briefing agenda included introductions by Sean Watson of FBI/SDNY, prosecutions overview, media engagement, victim rights, and open discussion.
Victim interviews were scheduled for October 16, 2019, at the Miami Field Office.
